show.subtitle: Dr. Len and Nurse Vicki discuss various natural and holistic health topics while taking your calls.
show.title: Prescriptions For Health

title: Iron, Alzheimers, Trainee Surgeons
content:
· How Iron Supplements Can Reduce Fatigue · A Nutrient Cocktail to Treat Alzheimers · Should You Be Told if a Trainee... <!--more--> Does Your Surgery?
· And much more!
Vicki’s 20:20 Health Tips: · Men Teaching Classes for Women (LOL) · Observations on Growing Older Callers: · Dorothy (SC):  Iron is better absorbed if taken with Vitamin C.
Proton Pump Inhibitors block iron, etc.
· Sharon (NM): Nutrient cocktail from MIT for Alzheimer’s Disease
